property.name: transparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings.

property.name: strokeTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the stroke.

property.name: fillTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the fill applied to the PageItemDefault.

property.name: contentTransparencySettings
property.shortdesc: Transparency settings for the content of the PageItemDefault.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the PageItemDefault &#40;a Application or Document).

property.name: preferences
property.shortdesc: A collection of preferences objects.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: topLeftCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to be applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes.Note: corner option differs from end join in which you can set a radius for a corner option, whereas the rounded or beveled effect of an end join depends on the stroke weight.

property.name: topRightCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomLeftCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes.

property.name: bottomRightCornerOption
property.shortdesc: The shape to apply to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes.

property.name: topLeftCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top left corner of rectangular shapes and all corners of non-rectangular shapes

property.name: topRightCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the top right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomLeftCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom left corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: bottomRightCornerRadius
property.shortdesc: The radius in measurement units of the corner effect applied to the bottom right corner of rectangular shapes

property.name: appliedGraphicObjectStyle
property.shortdesc: The default graphic object style applied to the PageItemDefault. Can also accept: String.

property.name: appliedTextObjectStyle
property.shortdesc: The default text object style applied to the PageItemDefault. Can also accept: String.

property.name: appliedGridObjectStyle
property.shortdesc: The default frame grid object style applied to the PageItemDefault. Can also accept: String.

property.name: fillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the PageItemDefault. . Can also accept: String.

property.name: fillTint
property.shortdesc: The percent of tint to use in the PageItemDefault's fill color. &#40;To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: strokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The weight &#40;in points) to apply to the PageItemDefault's stroke.

property.name: miterLimit
property.shortdesc: The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter &#40;pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join.

property.name: endCap
property.shortdesc: The end shape of an open path.

property.name: endJoin
property.shortdesc: The corner join applied to the PageItemDefault.

property.name: strokeType
property.shortdesc: The name of the stroke style to apply. Can also accept: String.

property.name: leftLineEnd
property.shortdesc: The arrowhead applied to the start of the path.

property.name: rightLineEnd
property.shortdesc: The arrowhead applied to the end of the path.

property.name: strokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the PageItemDefault. Can also accept: String.

property.name: strokeTint
property.shortdesc: The percent of tint to use in object's stroke color. &#40;To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: gradientFillAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the PageItemDefault. &#40;Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: gradientStrokeAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the PageItemDefault. &#40;Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: overprintStroke
property.shortdesc: If true, the PageItemDefault's stroke color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the stroke color knocks out the  underlying colors.

property.name: overprintFill
property.shortdesc: If true, the PageItemDefault's fill color overprints any underlying objects. If false, the fill color knocks out the underlying colors.

property.name: gapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of a dashed, dotted, or striped stroke. For information, see stroke type.

property.name: gapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint as a percentage of the gap color. &#40;To specify a tint percent, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.)

property.name: overprintGap
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color overprints any underlying colors. If false, the gap color knocks out the underlying colors.

property.name: strokeAlignment
property.shortdesc: The stroke alignment applied to the PageItemDefault.

property.name: nonprinting
property.shortdesc: If true, the PageItemDefault does not print.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameter.name: clearingOverrides
parameter.shortdesc: If true, clears the PageItemDefault's existing attributes before applying the style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: clearingOverridesThroughRootObjectStyle
parameter.shortdesc: If true, clears attributes and formatting applied to the PageItemDefault that are not defined in the object style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PageItemDefault.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
